pageTitle: Boggs in line for second school board censure | ColumbineCourier.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {31975=Copyright © 2015, 25507=Columbine Courier | circulation@columbinecourier.com | 303-350-1030 5808 S Rapp St, Suite 119, Littleton, CO 80120 Office Hours are 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, 19965=Boggs likely will receive her second censure at the Nov. 1 board meeting. The board censured her in 2010 for a variety of behavior, including linking the words “school” and “stupid” on a classroom white board and telling Superintendent Cindy Stevenson she would “tear this county apart.”}
